title: Fossil fuel graph - oil use grew fastest 1965-80

content.prompt: According to the data plotted in the graph above, which of the following is true about the increase in world fossil fuel consumption between 1965 and 1980 ?

choices.label: Increases in oil, coal, and natural gas consumption occurred at about the same rate.
Increases in oil and coal consumption outpaced the increase in natural gas consumption.
The increase in coal consumption outpaced the increases in oil and natural gas consumption.
The increase in natural gas consumption outpaced the increases in oil and coal consumption.
The increase in oil consumption outpaced the increases in coal and natural gas consumption.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
